entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
